title: Champion Insights: Poppy, Keeper of the Hammer

replies.body:
{{champion:161}}  can wear {{item:1001}} 
{{champion:63}}  takes normal damage from{{champion:267}} 
{{champion:24}}  can deal tons of damage with a lamppost
{{champion:245}}  can rewind time, and kill people in the process...of rewinding time, da fuq?
{{champion:39}}  cant be nerfed
{{champion:82}}  Can have his own dragon
{{champion:54}}  can wear {{item:1031}} 
{{champion:2}}  can make your mum jokes
{{champion:4}}  can deal damage using cards (not paper%%%s)
{{champion:8}}  can have massive periods
{{champion:154}}  can be bubblegun(if u have chroma)
{{champion:420}}  can promote hentai, and nothing happens
BUT {{champion:104}} CANT HAVE A SIMPLE CIGAR?!?!?!

 WFG 4thSurvivor  - 4 days ago

She was and still is my fav character in the game after I've seen a bit of her on the PBE, the rework on her abilities is good imo (good enough for me at least, thx riot). However the ingame skins should look more like the splashart : on the art she looks cute, smart and mighty, while still being the innocent yordle you mention, whereas she just looks dumb in game... :s not to mention her face shape in game doesn t fit the art either. Is there anyway that could be adressed ?

Couldn't agree with this more.
The splash looks absolutely amazing, but the in-game graphics resemble don't quite match up. I suppose it'd be too difficult to meddle with this now, but other than that I'm really looking forward to how she plays out.
what would happen if you ulted an enemy away at the same time a {{champion:412}} hooked to that champion or a {{champion:64}} jumped on the enemy
When did story ever matter in league? Just make a cool champion because it's fun.
When poppy ults you so hard you end up in My Space
